description:
The Cirra AI MCP server provides comprehensive Salesforce administration and data management capabilities. 

This server allows you to configure connections with multiple Salesforce organizations via OAuth , organize them by teams, and set access controls.
 
The robust set of tools covers all major Salesforce APIs -- both for data and metadata, and supports use cases like:
✅ Documenting orgs and cleaning up technical debt
✅ Creating custom objects, fields, and page layouts
✅ Provisioning users, assigning permission sets and managing queues and groups
✅ Building or updating flows

And much more...

capabilities.name: logout
capabilities.description: Logout from Cirra AI MCP server

capabilities.name: cirra_ai_init
capabilities.description:
IMPORTANT: call `cirra_ai_init` before calling any other tools of this MCP server or when you don't know the answer to a request which relates to Cirra AI or Salesforce.
This tool will return the following info:
- Important instructions
- System context
- User info
- User subscription details
- Cirra AI contact & support information
You MUST carefully read the instructions returned from this tool call before proceeding

capabilities.name: link_build
capabilities.description: Build Salesforce links for setup pages. Always use this tool when user requests a setup page link

capabilities.name: sf_org_describe
capabilities.description: Describe the current connected Salesforce organization

capabilities.name: sf_orgs_list
capabilities.description: List all the Salesforce organizations that the current user has access to

capabilities.name: sf_org_select
capabilities.description: Select a Salesforce organization to use for the current session. (aka: switch organization, change organization)

capabilities.name: sf_org_add
capabilities.description: Add a Salesforce organization to the current session. (Also referred to as: connect new organization, authenticate new organization)

capabilities.name: sf_org_reauthenticate
capabilities.description: Reauthorize a connected Salesforce organization. (Also referred to as: refresh organization, reauthenticate organization)

capabilities.name: sf_org_remove
capabilities.description: Remove a Salesforce organization from the current session

capabilities.name: sobjects_list
capabilities.description: Lists all the available sObject types and provides some of their key properties including ID, name, label and type. To get more details about an sObject, use `sobject_describe`

capabilities.name: sobject_describe
capabilities.description: Return basic metadata properties for the specified sObject, as well as a list of fields, relationships and record types.

capabilities.name: sobject_update
capabilities.description: Update properties of a custom object in Salesforce

capabilities.name: sobject_create
capabilities.description: Create a new custom Salesforce object in Salesforce

capabilities.name: sobject_relations_list
capabilities.description: Return full metadata properties for all the child relations of a Salesforce object, including API name, label and target type

capabilities.name: sobject_relation_describe
capabilities.description: Completely describe the metadata for an sObject child relationship in Salesforce

capabilities.name: sobject_fields_list
capabilities.description: Lists all the fields of the specified sObject and provides some of their key properties including ID, name, label and type. To get more details about the field, use sobject_field_describe

capabilities.name: sobject_field_describe
capabilities.description: Return all metadata properties for a field on an sObject in Salesforce

capabilities.name: sobject_field_create
capabilities.description: Create a new custom field for an sObject in Salesforce

capabilities.name: sobject_field_update
capabilities.description: Update properties of a custom sObject field (standard or custom) in Salesforce, including local picklist values

capabilities.name: permission_set_describe
capabilities.description: Return complete metadata for a permission set in Salesforce

capabilities.name: permission_set_create
capabilities.description: Create a new permission set in Salesforce

capabilities.name: permission_set_update
capabilities.description: Update the properties or contents of a permission set in Salesforce, including read and edit access to objects and fields

capabilities.name: permission_set_assignments_add
capabilities.description: Add permission set assignments to users in Salesforce

capabilities.name: permission_set_assignments_remove
capabilities.description: Remove permission set assignments from users in Salesforce

capabilities.name: permission_set_assignments_list
capabilities.description: Get permission set assignments for the specified user(s) and/or permission set(s)

capabilities.name: group_describe
capabilities.description: Return full metadata for a public group, queue or role in Salesforce

capabilities.name: group_create
capabilities.description: Create a new public group, queue or role in Salesforce

capabilities.name: group_update
capabilities.description: Update a public group or queue in Salesforce

capabilities.name: group_members_add
capabilities.description: Add users to one or more public groups or queues in Salesforce

capabilities.name: group_members_remove
capabilities.description: Remove users from one or more public groups or queues in Salesforce

capabilities.name: group_members_list
capabilities.description: Get group memberships for public groups, queues or roles and/or specified users. Both groups and users are optional, but at least one must be provided.

capabilities.name: value_set_describe
capabilities.description: Return values of a standard or global value set in Salesforce

capabilities.name: value_set_create
capabilities.description: Create a new global value set in Salesforce

capabilities.name: value_set_update
capabilities.description: Update the values in a standard or global value set in Salesforce

capabilities.name: user_describe
capabilities.description: Return complete metadata for a Salesforce user

capabilities.name: user_create
capabilities.description: Create a new Salesforce user. You can clone an existing user by providing the `template` parameter, or create a new user from scratch by providing the `profile` and other parameters

capabilities.name: user_update
capabilities.description: Perform an update operation on a Salesforce user

capabilities.name: profile_describe
capabilities.description: Return detailed metadata for a Salesforce Profile.

capabilities.name: profile_create
capabilities.description: Create a new Salesforce profile from a JSON object

capabilities.name: profile_clone
capabilities.description: Clone an existing user profile in Salesforce

capabilities.name: profile_update
capabilities.description: Update a user profile in Salesforce

capabilities.name: page_layout_describe
capabilities.description: Return complete metadata for a given page layout in Salesforce

capabilities.name: page_layout_create
capabilities.description: Create a new page layout from scratch in Salesforce

capabilities.name: page_layout_update
capabilities.description: update the properties or contents of a page layout, include adding or removing fields in Salesforce

capabilities.name: page_layout_clone
capabilities.description: Create a new page layout by cloning an existing layout in Salesforce

capabilities.name: record_type_describe
capabilities.description: Describe an sObject record type in Salesforce

capabilities.name: record_type_create
capabilities.description: Create a new sObject record type in Salesforce

capabilities.name: record_type_update
capabilities.description: Update or activate/deactivate an sObject record type in Salesforce

capabilities.name: apex_class_create
capabilities.description: Create a Salesforce Apex class

capabilities.name: apex_class_update
capabilities.description: Update an existing Apex class in Salesforce

capabilities.name: apex_trigger_create
capabilities.description: Create a Salesforce Apex trigger

capabilities.name: apex_trigger_update
capabilities.description: Update an existing Apex trigger in Salesforce

capabilities.name: metadata_describe
capabilities.description: Return a list of all the Salesforce metadata types available in the org, along with a few global properties of the org

capabilities.name: metadata_list
capabilities.description: List Salesforce metadata elements of a specific type, optionally scoped by folder

capabilities.name: metadata_read
capabilities.description: Provide full details for one or more metadata elements of a specified type

capabilities.name: metadata_create
capabilities.description: Create one or more Salesforce metadata elements of a specified type

capabilities.name: metadata_update
capabilities.description: Update one or more Salesforce metadata elements of a specified type.

capabilities.name: metadata_delete
capabilities.description: Delete one or more metadata elements of a specified type in Salesforce. Maximum number is 10 per batch - DO NOT EXCEED.

capabilities.name: tooling_api_query
capabilities.description: Runs a Salesforce Tooling API query to return a list of metadata objects

capabilities.name: tooling_api_search
capabilities.description: Runs a Tooling API search to return a list of matching metadata objects in Salesforce

capabilities.name: tooling_api_dml
capabilities.description: Perform DML operations on Salesforce Tooling API records. This function is used to create, update, delete, and upsert tooling API records in Salesforce.

capabilities.name: tooling_api_describe
capabilities.description: Return a list of all the objects available through the Salesforce Tooling API. Use `tooling_api_query` with `FieldDefinition` to get the available fields for an object.

capabilities.name: sobject_dml
capabilities.description: Perform DML operations on Salesforce records. This function is used to create, update, delete, and upsert records in Salesforce.

capabilities.name: soql_query
capabilities.description: Runs a Salesforce SOQL query to return a list of sObject records. Encrypted fields are masked in the response

capabilities.name: report_run
capabilities.description: Execute a Salesforce report and return its results
